name: file-share-bot
description: Telegram bot to save files and generate permanent share links using MongoDB (Heroku supported).

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your bot username without @ (used to build share links)

ADMIN_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram user IDs of bot admins

MAX_FILE_SIZE_MB.description: Maximum file size (in MB) allowed for upload
